strategy.message: I think the current HR team does a great job with employee engagement initiatives. But, for recruitment, it feels too centralized and slow, especially for tech roles.
I think the current HR team does a great job with employee engagement initiatives. But, for recruitment, it feels too centralized and slow, especially for tech roles.

Building on that, one of the models we’re proposing is creating HR Business Partner Pods — smaller, embedded HR teams aligned directly to business units, with more autonomy over hiring, L&D, and workforce planning.
